data.disclaimer: Our information comes from the Census Bureau - the 2010 Census and the latest American Community Survey (five year summary).

justicemap.description: Visualize race and income data for your neighborhood, county, state, or the entire US

data.disclaimer: Data based on the the Odor Complaint Form plus a couple of logs found online

odorreport.description: Facilitates monitoring of bad odor events through the collection of data using a written odor log and an online map.

data.disclaimer: Every icon on the PurpleAir map represents a public PurpleAir sensor and the color indicates the real time PM2.5 reading on the US EPA Air Quality Index scale.

purpleair.description: An air quality monitoring network built on a new generation of "Internet of Things" sensors
purpleair.layer_desc: Air quality data from PurpleAir sensors
